SpecialEquipment.name: Special Equipment
SpecialEquipment.description: Jalester carries a badge of the Watch|wdh.

SecondWind(RechargesafteraShortorLongRes.name: Second Wind (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
SecondWind(RechargesafteraShortorLongRes.description: As a bonus action, Jalester can regain 16 (1d10 + 11) hit points.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Jalester makes two weapon attacks.

Longsword.name: Longsword
Longsword.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) slashing damage, or 7 (1d10 + 2) slashing damage when used with two hands.

Dagger.name: Dagger
Dagger.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage. Or Ranged Weapon Attack: 4 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

DarkDevotion.name: Dark Devotion
DarkDevotion.description: Jandar has advantage on saving throws against being charmed or frightened.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Jandar makes two melee attacks.

Dagger.name: Dagger
Dagger.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. on hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage. Or Ranged Weapon Attack: 4 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one creature. on hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

SpecialEquipment.name: Special Equipment
SpecialEquipment.description: Jarlaxle wears +3 leather armor, a hat of disguise, a bracer of flying daggers|wdh, a cloak of invisibility, a knave's eye patch|wdh, and a ring of truth telling|wdh. He wields a +3 rapier and carries a portable hole and a wand of web. His hat is adorned with a feather of diatryma summoning|wdh.

Evasion.name: Evasion
Evasion.description: If he is subjected to an effect that allows him to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, Jarlaxle instead takes no damage if he succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if he fails. He can't use this trait if he's incapacitated.

FeyAncestry.name: Fey Ancestry
FeyAncestry.description: Jarlaxle has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put him to sleep.

LegendaryResistance(1/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(1/Day).description: If Jarlaxle fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

MasterAttuner.name: Master Attuner
MasterAttuner.description: Jarlaxle can attune to up to five magic items, and he can attune to magic items that normally require attunement by a sorcerer, warlock, or wizard.

SneakAttack(1/Turn).name: Sneak Attack (1/Turn)
SneakAttack(1/Turn).description: Jarlaxle deals an extra 24 (7d6) damage when he hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of Jarlaxle's that isn't incapacitated and Jarlaxle doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

SuaveDefense.name: Suave Defense
SuaveDefense.description: While Jarlaxle is wearing light or no armor and wielding no shield, his AC includes his Charisma modifier.

SunlightSensitivity.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
SunlightSensitivity.description: When not wearing his knave's eye patch, Jarlaxle has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Jarlaxle makes three attacks with his +3 rapier or two attacks with daggers created by his bracer of flying daggers.

+3Rapier.name: +3Rapier
+3Rapier.description: mw 14 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 13 (1d8 + 9) piercing damage.

FlyingDagger.name: FlyingDagger
FlyingDagger.description: rw 11 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 8 (1d4 + 6) piercing damage.

SpecialEquipment.name: Special Equipment
SpecialEquipment.description: Kaevja carries a yellow elemental gem. As an action she can break the gem releasing an earth elemental under her command.

Dagger.name: Dagger
Dagger.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage. Or Ranged Weapon Attack: 5 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

FeyAncestry.name: Fey Ancestry
FeyAncestry.description: Kalain has advantage on saving throws against being charmed and magic can't put her to sleep.

ArtImitatesLife(3/Day).name: Art Imitates Life
ArtImitatesLife(3/Day).description: Kalain touches one of her paintings and causes its subject to spring forth, becoming a creature of that kind provided its CR is 3 or lower. The creature appears in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the painting, which becomes blank. The creature is friendly toward Kalain and hostile toward all others. It rolls initiative to determine when it acts. It disappears after 1 minute, when it is reduced to 0 hit points, or when Kalain dies or falls unconscious.

Taunt(2/Day).name: Taunt
Taunt(2/Day).description: Kalain can use a bonus action on her turn to target one creature within 30 feet of it. If the target can hear Kalain, the target must succeed on a DC 12 Charisma saving throw or have disadvantage on ability checks, attack rolls, and saving throws until the start of Kalain's next turn.

Shortsword.name: Shortsword
Shortsword.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

Shortbow.name: Shortbow
Shortbow.description: rw 4 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

FalseAppearance.name: False Appearance
FalseAppearance.description: While the gargoyle remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an inanimate statue.

HalflingNimbleness.name: Halfling Nimbleness
HalflingNimbleness.description: Losser can move through the space of a creature that is a size bigger than him.

Brave.name: Brave
Brave.description: Losser has advantage on saving throws against being frightened.

Dagger.name: Dagger
Dagger.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage. Or Ranged Weapon Attack: 5 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

FeyAncestry.name: Fey Ancestry
FeyAncestry.description: Umbero has advantage on saving throws against being charmed and magic can't put him to sleep.

Rapier.name: Rapier
Rapier.description: mw 3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d8 + 1) piercing damage.

HalflingNimbleness.name: Halfling Nimbleness
HalflingNimbleness.description: Manafret can move through a space of a Medium or larger creature.

Brave.name: Brave
Brave.description: Manafret has advantage on saving throws against being frightened.

Dagger.name: Dagger
Dagger.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage. Or Ranged Weapon Attack: 5 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

MetalFist.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

FeyAncestry.description: Melannor has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put him to sleep.

Quarterstaff.description: mw 2 to hit or Melee Weapon Attack 4 to hit with shillelagh, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 3 (1d6) bludgeoning damage, or 6 (1d8 + 2) bludgeoning damage with shillelagh or if wielded with two hands.

SpecialEquipment.name: Special Equipment
SpecialEquipment.description: Meloon wields Azuredge|wdh but can't attune to it, and thus gains none of its benefits.

Indomitable(2/Day).name: Indomitable
Indomitable(2/Day).description: Meloon can reroll a saving throw that he fails. He must use the new roll.

SecondWind(RechargesafteraShortorLongRes.name: Second Wind (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
SecondWind(RechargesafteraShortorLongRes.description: As a bonus action, Meloon can regain 20 hit points.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Meloon makes four attacks with Azuredge.

Azuredge.name: Azuredge
Azuredge.description: m 9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 11 (1d12 + 5) slashing damage.

SpecialEquipment.name: Special Equipment
SpecialEquipment.description: Mirt wears bracers of defense and a ring of regeneration. He wields a +1 longsword and a +1 dagger.

Brute.name: Brute
Brute.description: A melee weapon deals one extra die of its damage when Mirt hits with it (included in the attacks below).

Evasion.name: Evasion
Evasion.description: If he is subjected to an effect that allows him to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, Mirt instead takes no damage if he succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if he fails. He can't use this trait if he's incapacitated.

SneakAttack(1/Turn).name: Sneak Attack (1/Turn)
SneakAttack(1/Turn).description: Mirt deals an extra 14 (4d6) damage when he hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of Mirt's that isn't incapacitated and Mirt doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Mirt makes three attacks: two with his +1 longsword and one with his +1 dagger.

+1Longsword.name: +1Longsword
+1Longsword.description: mw 9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 14 (2d8 + 5) slashing damage, or 16 (2d10 + 5) slashing damage when used with two hands.

+1Dagger.name: +1Dagger
+1Dagger.description: mw 9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 10 (2d4 + 5) piercing damage. Or Ranged Weapon Attack: 9 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d4 + 5) piercing damage.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The nimblewright has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

MagicWeapons.name: Magic Weapons
MagicWeapons.description: The nimblewright's weapon attacks are magical.

Repairable.name: Repairable
Repairable.description: As long as it has at least 1 hit point remaining, the nimblewright regains 1 hit point when a mending spell is cast on it.

Sure-Footed.name: Sure-Footed
Sure-Footed.description: The nimblewright has advantage on Strength and Dexterity saving throws made against effects that would knock it prone.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The nimblewright makes three attacks: two with its rapier and one with its dagger.

Rapier.name: Rapier
Rapier.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage.

Dagger.name: Dagger
Dagger.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d4 + 4) piercing damage. Or Ranged Weapon Attack: 6 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d4 + 4) piercing damage.

PackTactics.name: Pack Tactics
PackTactics.description: Noska has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of Noska's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

DwarvenResilience.name: Dwarven Resilience
DwarvenResilience.description: Noska has advantage on saving throws against poison and resistance to poison damage.

DifficultClimber.name: Difficult Climber
DifficultClimber.description: Noska has disadvantage on Strength checks made to climb, due to his disability.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Noska makes two melee attacks.

Mace.name: Mace
Mace.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. on hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

HeavyCrossbow.description: rw 2 to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d10) piercing damage.

BloodFrenzy.name: Blood Frenzy
BloodFrenzy.description: Obliteros has advantage on melee attack rolls against any creature that doesn't have all its hit points.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 22 (3d10 + 6) piercing damage.

Rapier.name: Rapier
Rapier.description: mw 3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d8 + 1) piercing damage.

DwarvenResilience.name: Dwarven Resilience
DwarvenResilience.description: Ott has advantage on saving throws against poison and resistance to poison damage.

DarkDevotion.name: Dark Devotion
DarkDevotion.description: The cultist has advantage on saving throws against being charmed or frightened.

Scimitar.name: Scimitar
Scimitar.description: mw 3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. on hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) slashing damage.

DwarvenResilience.name: Dwarven Resilience
DwarvenResilience.description: The dwarf has advantage on saving throws against poison and resistance to poison damage.

Dagger.name: Dagger
Dagger.description: mw 2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 2 (1d4) piercing damage. Or Ranged Weapon Attack: 2 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 2 (1d4) piercing damage.

SpecialEquipment.name: Special Equipment
SpecialEquipment.description: Remallia has a Figurine of Wondrous Power, Silver Raven||figurine of wondrous power (silver raven).

FeyAncestry.name: Fey Ancestry
FeyAncestry.description: Remallia has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put her to sleep.

ArcaneWard.name: Arcane Ward
ArcaneWard.description: Remallia has a magical ward that has 30 hit points. Whenever she takes damage, the ward takes the damage instead. If the ward is reduced to 0 hit points, Remallia takes any remaining damage. When Remallia casts an abjuration spell of 1st level or higher, the ward regains a number of hit points equal to twice the level of the spell. This applies to any of the following spells she casts: alarm, mage armor, shield, arcane lock, counterspell, dispel magic, banishment, stoneskin, globe of invulnerability and symbol.

Dagger.name: Dagger
Dagger.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

Lightfooted.name: Lightfooted
Lightfooted.description: The swashbuckler can take the Dash or Disengage action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

SuaveDefense.name: Suave Defense
SuaveDefense.description: While the swashbuckler is wearing light or no armor and wielding no shield, its AC includes its Charisma modifier.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The swashbuckler makes three attacks: one with a dagger and two with its rapier.

Dagger.name: Dagger
Dagger.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d4 + 4) piercing damage. Or Ranged Weapon Attack: 6 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d4 + 4) piercing damage.

Rapier.name: Rapier
Rapier.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage.

BreathWeapon.name: BreathWeapon
BreathWeapon.description: Rishaal can use his action to exhale a 15-foot cone of fire (but can't do this again until he finishes a short or long rest); each creature in the cone must make a DC 10 Dexterity saving throw, taking 2d6 fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

Dagger.name: Dagger
Dagger.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage. Or Ranged Weapon Attack: 5 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Saeth makes two longsword attacks. If he has a shortsword drawn, he can also make a shortsword attack.

Longsword.name: Longsword
Longsword.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage, or 8 (1d10 + 3) slashing damage if used with two hands.

Shortsword.name: Shortsword
Shortsword.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

HeavyCrossbow.name: HeavyCrossbow
HeavyCrossbow.description: rw 3 to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d10 + 1) piercing damage.

Shapechanger.name: Shapechanger
Shapechanger.description: The Shard Shunner can use their action to polymorph into a rat-humanoid hybrid or into a giant rat, or back into their true form, which is humanoid. Their statistics, other than their size, are the same in each form. Any equipment they are wearing or carrying isn't transformed. They revert to their true form if they die.

KeenSmell.name: Keen Smell
KeenSmell.description: The Shard Shunner has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

HalflingNimbleness.name: Halfling Nimbleness
HalflingNimbleness.description: The Shard Shunner can move through the space of creatures that is of a size larger than them.

Brave.name: Brave
Brave.description: The Shard Shunner has advantage on saving throws against being frightened.

piercingfromnonmagicalattacksthataren'ts.name: piercing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

slashingfromnonmagicalattacksthataren'ts.name: slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

Multiattack(HumanoidorHybridFormOnly).name: Multiattack(HumanoidorHybridFormOnly)
Multiattack(HumanoidorHybridFormOnly).description: The Shard Shunner makes two attacks, only one of which can be a bite.

Bite(RatorHybridFormOnly).name: Bite(RatorHybridFormOnly)
Bite(RatorHybridFormOnly).description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage. If the target is a humanoid, it must succeed on a DC 11 Constitution saving throw or be cursed with wererat lycanthropy.

Shortsword(HumanoidorHybridFormOnly).name: Shortsword(HumanoidorHybridFormOnly)
Shortsword(HumanoidorHybridFormOnly).description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

value.value: Hand Crossbow (Humanoid or Hybrid Form Only)

HandCrossbow(HumanoidorHybridFormOnly).description: rw 4 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

GnomeCunning.name: Gnome Cunning
GnomeCunning.description: Skeemo has advantage on Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma saving throws against magic.

Dagger.name: Dagger
Dagger.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage. Or Ranged Weapon Attack: 5 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

FeyAncestry.name: Fey Ancestry
FeyAncestry.description: Soluun has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put Soluun to sleep.

Gunslinger.name: Gunslinger
Gunslinger.description: Being within 5 feet of a hostile creature or attacking at long range doesn't impose disadvantage on Soluun's ranged attack rolls with a pistol. In addition, Soluun ignores Cover||3||half cover and Cover||3||three-quarters cover when making ranged attacks with a pistol.

SunlightSensitivity.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
SunlightSensitivity.description: While in sunlight, Soluun has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

Equipment.name: Equipment
Equipment.description: Four packets of smokepowder and a pouch containing 20 pistol bullets

BootsofElvenkind.name: Boots of Elvenkind
BootsofElvenkind.description: Whilst wearing these boots Soluun's steps make no sound and he has advantage on any Dexterity (Stealth) checks that rely on moving silently.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Soluun makes two scimitar attacks.

Scimitar.name: Scimitar
Scimitar.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) slashing damage.

PoisonousPistol.name: PoisonousPistol
PoisonousPistol.description: rw 6 to hit, range 30/90 ft., one target. on hit: 9 (1d10 + 4) piercing damage plus 11 (2d10) poison damage.

Swarm.name: Swarm
Swarm.description: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny book. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

Slam.name: Slam
Slam.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 0 ft., one creature in the swarm's space. on hit: 5 (2d4) bludgeoning damage, or 2 (1d4) bludgeoning damage if the swarm has half of its hit points or fewer.

ConstructedNature.name: Constructed Nature
ConstructedNature.description: The swarm doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

Swarm.name: Swarm
Swarm.description: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny insect. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

SpiderClimb.name: Spider Climb
SpiderClimb.description: The swarm can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

WebSense.name: Web Sense
WebSense.description: While in contact with a web, the swarm knows the exact location of any other creature in contact with the same web.

WebWalker.name: Web Walker
WebWalker.description: The swarm ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.

Bites.name: Bites
Bites.description: mw 3 to hit, reach 0 ft., one target in the swarm's space. on hit: 10 (4d4) piercing damage, or 5 (2d4) piercing damage if the swarm has half of its hit points or fewer.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 1 piercing damage.

FeyAncestry.name: Fey Ancestry
FeyAncestry.description: Tally has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put him to sleep.

Club.name: Club
Club.description: mw 2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 2 (1d4) bludgeoning damage.

Indomitable(2/Day).name: Indomitable
Indomitable(2/Day).description: Tashlyn can reroll a saving throw that she fails. She must use the new roll.

SecondWind(RechargesafteraShortorLongRes.name: Second Wind (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
SecondWind(RechargesafteraShortorLongRes.description: As a bonus action, Tashlyn can regain 20 hit points.

ExtraDamage.name: Extra Damage
ExtraDamage.description: Tashlyn deals an extra 7 (2d6) damage to every hit if she has more than half her hit points remaining.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Tashlyn makes three attacks with her greatsword or her shortbow.

Greatsword.name: Greatsword
Greatsword.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage.

Shortbow.name: Shortbow
Shortbow.description: rw 6 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

DwarvenResilience.name: Dwarven Resilience
DwarvenResilience.description: Thorvin has advantage on saving throws against poison and resistance to poison damage.

Club.name: Club
Club.description: mw 2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 2 (1d4) bludgeoning damage.

Reckless.name: Reckless
Reckless.description: At the start of his turn, Thrakkus can gain advantage on all melee weapon attack rolls during that turn, but attack rolls against him have advantage until the start of his next turn.

Greataxe.name: Greataxe
Greataxe.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 9 (1d12 + 3) slashing damage.

BreathWeapon(1/Day).name: BreathWeapon(1/Day)
BreathWeapon(1/Day).description: Thrakkus can use his action to exhale a 15-foot cone of fire. Each creature in the cone must make a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw, taking 6 (2d6) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

DarkDevotion.name: Dark Devotion
DarkDevotion.description: Tissina has advantage on saving throws against being charmed or frightened.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Tissina makes two melee attacks.

Dagger.name: Dagger
Dagger.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. on hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage. Or Ranged Weapon Attack: 4 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one creature. on hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

Assassinate.name: Assassinate
Assassinate.description: During its first turn, Urstul has advantage on attack rolls against any creature that hasn't taken a turn. Any hit Urstul scores against a surprised creature is a critical hit.

Evasion.name: Evasion
Evasion.description: If Urstul is subjected to an effect that allows him to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, Urstul instead takes no damage if he succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails.

SneakAttack(1/Turn).name: Sneak Attack (1/Turn)
SneakAttack(1/Turn).description: Urstul deals an extra 14 (4d6) damage when he hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of Urstul that isn't incapacitated and Urstul doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Urstul makes two shortsword attacks.

Shortsword.name: Shortsword
Shortsword.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage, and the target must make a DC 15 Constitution saving throw, taking 24 (7d6) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

LightCrossbow.name: LightCrossbow
LightCrossbow.description: rw 6 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage, and the target must make a DC 15 Constitution saving throw, taking 24 (7d6) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

SpecialEquipment.name: Special Equipment
SpecialEquipment.description: Vajra wields the Blackstaff|WDH, accounted for in her statistics. Roll 2d10 to determine how many charges the staff has remaining.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: Vajra has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

StaffSpells.name: Staff Spells
StaffSpells.description: While holding the Blackstaff|WDH, Vajra can use an action to expend 1 or more of its charges to cast one of the following spells from it, using her spell save DC and spell attack bonus: cone of cold (5 charges), fireball (5th-level version, 5 charges), globe of invulnerability (6 charges), hold monster (5 charges), levitate (2 charges), lightning bolt (5th-level version, 5 charges), magic missile (1 charge), ray of enfeeblement (1 charge), or wall of force (5 charges).

Blackstaff.name: Blackstaff
Blackstaff.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) bludgeoning, magic damage, or 6 (1d8 + 2) bludgeoning, magic damage when used with two hands. Vajra can expend 1 of the staff's charges to deal an extra 3 (1d6) force damage on a hit.

DivineEminence.name: Divine Eminence
DivineEminence.description: As a bonus action, Valetta can expend a spell slot to cause her melee weapon attacks to magically deal an extra 10 (3d6) radiant damage to a target on a hit. This benefit lasts until the end of the turn. If Valetta expends a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the extra damage increases by 1d6 for each level above 1st.

BreatheWeapon.name: BreatheWeapon
BreatheWeapon.description: Valetta can use her action to exhale a 5-foot-wide, 30-foot line of lightning (but can't do this again until she finishes a short or long rest); each creature in the line must make a DC 11 Dexterity saving throw, taking 2d6 lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

Mace.name: Mace
Mace.description: mw 2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 3 (1d6) bludgeoning damage.

SpecialEquipment.name: Special Equipment
SpecialEquipment.description: Victoro wears a ring of protection and glamoured studded leather disguised to look like fine clothing. He carries a rod of rulership shaped like a ruby-tipped cane.

FeyAncestry.name: Fey Ancestry
FeyAncestry.description: Victoro has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put him to sleep.

RodofRulership.name: Rod of Rulership
RodofRulership.description: Victoro can use an action to present the rod and command obedience from each creature of his choice that he can see within 120 feet of him. Each target must succeed on a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw or be charmed for 8 hours by Victoro. While charmed in this way, the creature regards Victoro as its trusted leader. If harmed by Victoro or his companions, or commanded to do something contrary to its nature, a target ceases to be charmed in this way. The rod can't be used again until the next dawn.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Victoro makes two attacks with his rapier.

Rapier.name: Rapier
Rapier.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d8 + 1) piercing damage.

CloakofShadows(2/Day).name: CloakofShadows(2/Day)
CloakofShadows(2/Day).description: Victoro becomes invisible until the end of his next turn. He becomes visible early immediately after he attacks or casts a spell.

SummonDevil(Rechargesafter9Days).name: SummonDevil(Rechargesafter9Days)
SummonDevil(Rechargesafter9Days).description: Victoro summons a barbed devil. The devil appears in an unoccupied space within 30 feet of Victoro, acts as Victoro's ally, and can't summon other devils. It remains for 1 minute, until it or Victoro dies, or until Victoro dismisses it as an action.

CrumblingColossus.name: Crumbling Colossus
CrumblingColossus.description: When the statue drops to 0 hit points, it crumbles and is destroyed. Any creature on the ground within 30 feet of the crumbling statue must make a DC 22 Dexterity saving throw, taking 22 (4d10) bludgeoning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

ImmutableForm.name: Immutable Form
ImmutableForm.description: The statue is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The statue has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

SiegeMonster.name: Siege Monster
SiegeMonster.description: The statue deals double damage to objects and structures.

bludgeoningfromnonmagicalattacksnotmadew.name: bludgeoning from nonmagical attacks not made with adamantine weapons

piercingfromnonmagicalattacksnotmadewith.name: piercing from nonmagical attacks not made with adamantine weapons

slashingfromnonmagicalattacksnotmadewith.name: slashing from nonmagical attacks not made with adamantine weapons

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The statue makes two melee attacks.

Slam.name: Slam
Slam.description: mw 16 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 29 (3d12 + 10) bludgeoning damage.

HurledStone.name: HurledStone
HurledStone.description: rw 16 to hit, range 200/800 ft., one target. on hit: 43 (6d10 + 10) bludgeoning damage.

RelentlessEndurance.name: Relentless Endurance
RelentlessEndurance.description: When reduced to 0 hit points, Yagra drops to 1 hit point instead (but can't do this again until she finishes a long rest).

PackTactics.name: Pack Tactics
PackTactics.description: Yagra has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of her allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

SavageAttacks.name: Savage Attacks
SavageAttacks.description: When she scores a critical hit Yagra can roll one of the weapon's damage dice and add it to the extra damage of the critical hit.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Yagra makes two melee attacks.

Mace.name: Mace
Mace.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. on hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

HeavyCrossbow.name: HeavyCrossbow
HeavyCrossbow.description: rw 2 to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d10) piercing damage.

Rapier.name: Rapier
Rapier.description: mw 3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d8 + 1) piercing damage.

PackTactics.name: Pack Tactics
PackTactics.description: The thug has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the thug's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

RelentlessEndurance(1/Day).name: Relentless Endurance
RelentlessEndurance(1/Day).description: When reduced to 0 hit points Yorn drops to 1 hit point instead.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The thug makes two melee attacks.

Mace.name: Mace
Mace.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. on hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

HeavyCrossbow.name: HeavyCrossbow
HeavyCrossbow.description: rw 2 to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d10) piercing damage.

HalflingNimbleness.name: Halfling Nimbleness
HalflingNimbleness.description: The adept can move through the space of a medium of larger creature.

Brave.name: Brave
Brave.description: The adept has advantage on any saving throws against being frightened.

UnarmoredDefense.name: Unarmored Defense
UnarmoredDefense.description: While the adept is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, their AC includes their Wisdom modifier.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The adept makes three unarmed strikes or three dart attacks.

UnarmedStrike.name: UnarmedStrike
UnarmedStrike.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, the adept can choose one of the following additional effects:

Dart.name: Dart
Dart.description: rw 5 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Ziraj makes three attacks with his glaive or with his oversized longbow.

Glaive.name: Glaive
Glaive.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 9 (1d10 + 4) slashing damage.

OversizedLongbow.name: OversizedLongbow
OversizedLongbow.description: rw 7 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. on hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage.

DreadfulAspect(RechargesafteraShortorLon.name: DreadfulAspect(RechargesafteraShortorLongRest)

value.value: Dreadful Aspect (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)

DreadfulAspect(RechargesafteraShortorLon.description: Ziraj exudes magical menace. Each enemy within 30 feet of him must succeed on a DC 13 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened for 1 minute of Ziraj. If a frightened enemy ends its turn more than 30 feet away from Ziraj, the enemy can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success.

MagicBolt.name: MagicBolt
MagicBolt.description: rw 6 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. on hit: 16 (3d10) fire damage

Slam.name: Slam
Slam.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 11 (2d8 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

BelchFire{@recharge4}.name: BelchFire{@recharge4}
BelchFire{@recharge4}.description: The stove belches fire in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in the area must make a DC 10 Dexterity saving throw, taking 22 (4d10) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

Tunneler.name: Tunneler
Tunneler.description: The worm can burrow through solid rock at half its burrow speed and leaves a 10-foot-diameter tunnel in its wake.

Regeneration.name: Regeneration
Regeneration.description: The worm regains 10 hit points at the start of each of its turns if it has at least 1 hit point.

bludgeoningfromnonmagicalattacksthataren.name: bludgeoning from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine

piercingfromnonmagicalattacksthataren'ta.name: piercing from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine

slashingfromnonmagicalattacksthataren'ta.name: slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The worm makes two attacks: one with its grinding jaws and one with its stinger.

GrindingJaws.name: GrindingJaws
GrindingJaws.description: mw 9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 22 (3d8 + 9) slashing damage.

TailStinger.name: TailStinger
TailStinger.description: mw 14 to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. on hit: 19 (3d6 + 9) piercing damage, and the target must make a DC 19 Constitution saving throw, taking 42 (12d6) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

SpecialEquipment.name: Special Equipment
SpecialEquipment.description: Halaster wears a robe of eyes that lets him see in all directions, gives him darkvision out to a range of 120 feet, grants advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight, and allows him to see invisible creatures and objects, as well as into the Ethereal Plane, out to a range of 120 feet.

ArcaneRecovery(1/Day).name: Arcane Recovery
ArcaneRecovery(1/Day).description: When he finishes a short rest, Halaster recovers all his spell slots of 5th level and lower.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If Halaster fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

Rejuvenation.name: Rejuvenation
Rejuvenation.description: If Halaster dies in Undermountain, he revives after 1d10 days, with all his hit points and any missing body parts restored. His new body appears in a random safe location in Undermountain.

lightning(grantedbytheblastscepter,see\".name: lightning (granted by the blast scepter, see "Special Equipment" below)

BlastScepter.name: BlastScepter
BlastScepter.description: Halaster uses his blast scepter to cast thunderwave as a 4th-level spell. Each creature in a 15-foot cube originating from him must make a DC 16 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 5d8 thunder damage and is pushed 10 feet away. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage and isn't pushed

SaltSensitivity.name: Salt Sensitivity
SaltSensitivity.description: A pound of salt thrown onto the snail's skin deals 1d6 acid damage to the creature.

MagicalProperties.name: Magical Properties
MagicalProperties.description: A creature that uses an action to touch the living snail gains 6 temporary hit points that last for 24 hours. Any creature or object that touches the living snail also gains the benefit of a remove curse spell. The snail loses these magical properties if it dies.

SpiderClimb.name: Spider Climb
SpiderClimb.description: The snail can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

MetalImmunity.name: Metal Immunity
MetalImmunity.description: The lava child can move through metal without hindrance, and it has advantage on attack rolls against any creature wearing metal armor or using a metal shield.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The lava child makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage.

Claws.name: Claws
Claws.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) slashing damage.

Slam.name: Slam
Slam.description: mw 2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 1 bludgeoning damage.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If Muiral fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Muiral makes three attacks: two with his longsword and one with his sting.

Longsword.name: Longsword
Longsword.description: mw 9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) slashing damage, or 15 (2d10 + 4) slashing damage if used with two hands.

Sting.name: Sting
Sting.description: mw 9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. on hit: 9 (1d10 + 4) piercing damage. The target must make a DC 16 Constitution saving throw, taking 27 (6d8) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

LightningAbsorption.name: Lightning Absorption
LightningAbsorption.description: Whenever the scaladar is subjected to lightning damage, it takes no damage, and its sting deals an extra 11 (2d10) lightning damage until the end of its next turn.

ScaladarLink.name: Scaladar Link
ScaladarLink.description: The scaladar knows the location of other scaladar within 100 feet of it, and it can sense when any of them take damage.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The scaladar makes three attacks: two with its claws and one with its sting.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 10 (1d12 + 4) bludgeoning damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 15). The scaladar has two claws, each of which can grapple one target.

Sting.name: Sting
Sting.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 9 (1d10 + 4) piercing damage plus 11 (2d10) lightning damage.

Amorphous.name: Amorphous
Amorphous.description: The assassin can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

ShadowStealth.name: Shadow Stealth
ShadowStealth.description: While in dim light or darkness, the assassin can take the Hide action as a bonus action.

SunlightWeakness.name: Sunlight Weakness
SunlightWeakness.description: While in sunlight, the assassin has disadvantage on attack rolls, ability checks, and saving throws.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The assassin makes two Shadow Blade attacks.

ShadowBlade.name: ShadowBlade
ShadowBlade.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) necrotic damage. Unless the target is immune to necrotic damage, the target's Strength score is reduced by 1d4 each time it is hit by this attack. The target dies if its Strength is reduced to 0. The reduction lasts until the target finishes a short or long rest. If a non-evil humanoid dies from this attack, a shadow (see the Monster Manual) rises from the corpse 1d4 hours later.

Disable.name: Disable
Disable.description: When a leg drops to 0 hit points, it is disabled, and Shockerstomper can use a reaction to detach it from its main body. Whenever one of its legs is disabled, Shockerstomper's walking speed is reduced by 10 feet. The whole contraption topples over and shuts down if four of its seven legs are disabled.

ElectrifiedSurface.name: Electrified Surface
ElectrifiedSurface.description: A creature that ends its turn in contact with Shockerstomper's body (saucer or turrets) must make a DC 15 Constitution saving throw, taking 22 (4d10) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

ImmutableForm.name: Immutable Form
ImmutableForm.description: Shockerstomper is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

ControlModule.name: Control Module
ControlModule.description: A creature atop or above Shockerstomper's platform can locate its control module with a successful DC 15 Intelligence (Investigation) check or Wisdom (Perception) check. As an action, a character can try to open the control module's access panel, either by tearing it off with a successful 25 Strength (Athletics) check or by dislodging it with thieves' tools and a successful 25 Dexterity check. Behind the panel, embedded in the floor of the control module, is a 5-foot-diameter pulsating crystal hemisphere with AC 10, 25 hit points, and immunity to poison and psychic damage. Destroying the crystal hemisphere shuts down Shockerstomper.

LightningTurret.name: Lightning Turret
LightningTurret.description: A character can try to plug the nozzle of a lightning turret with a 10-pound rock or similar object, doing so with a successful DC 15 Strength (Athletics) check. A plugged turret can't shoot lightning until a creature uses an action to try to clear the obstruction, which requires another successful DC 15 Strength (Athletics) check. Shockerstomper has no ability to clear an obstruction itself.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Shockerstomper makes three Lightning Turret attacks and two Stomp attacks.

LightningTurret.name: LightningTurret
LightningTurret.description: The turret shoots a magical lightning bolt at one creature within 60 feet of Shockerstomper. The target must make a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw, taking 44 (8d10) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

Stomp.name: Stomp
Stomp.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. on hit: 22 (3d10 + 6) bludgeoning damage.

Shapechanger.name: Shapechanger
Shapechanger.description: The werebat can use its action to polymorph into a Medium bat-humanoid hybrid, or into a Large giant bat, or back into its true form, which is humanoid. Its statistics, other than its size, are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

Echolocation(BatorHybridFormOnly).name: Echolocation (Bat or Hybrid Form Only)
Echolocation(BatorHybridFormOnly).description: The werebat has blindsight out to a range of 60 feet as long as it's not deafened.

KeenHearing.name: Keen Hearing
KeenHearing.description: The werebat has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing.

NimbleEscape(HumanoidFormOnly).name: Nimble Escape (Humanoid Form Only)
NimbleEscape(HumanoidFormOnly).description: The werebat can take the Disengage or Hide action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

SunlightSensitivity.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
SunlightSensitivity.description: While in sunlight, the werebat has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

bludgeoningfromnonmagicalattacksthataren.name: bludgeoning from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

piercingfromnonmagicalattacksthataren'ts.name: piercing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

slashingfromnonmagicalattacksthataren'ts.name: slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

Multiattack(HumanoidorHybridFormOnly).name: Multiattack(HumanoidorHybridFormOnly)
Multiattack(HumanoidorHybridFormOnly).description: In humanoid form, the werebat makes two scimitar attacks or two shortbow attacks. In hybrid form, it can make one bite attack and one scimitar attack.

Bite(BatorHybridFormOnly).name: Bite(BatorHybridFormOnly)
Bite(BatorHybridFormOnly).description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. on hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage, and the werebat gains temporary hit points equal to the damage dealt. If the target is a humanoid, it must succeed on a DC 10 Constitution saving throw or be cursed with werebat lycanthropy.

Scimitar(HumanoidorHybridFormOnly).name: Scimitar(HumanoidorHybridFormOnly)
Scimitar(HumanoidorHybridFormOnly).description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) slashing damage.

Shortbow(HumanoidorHybridFormOnly).name: Shortbow(HumanoidorHybridFormOnly)
Shortbow(HumanoidorHybridFormOnly).description: rw 5 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

value.condition: (climb 30 ft. fly 60 ft. in bat or hybrid form)

DwarvenResilience.name: Dwarven Resilience
DwarvenResilience.description: Zorak has advantage on saving throws against poison, and has resistance against poison damage.

Shapechanger.name: Shapechanger
Shapechanger.description: If Zorak isn't in sunlight or running water, he can use his action to polymorph into a Tiny bat or a Medium cloud of mist, or back into his true form.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If Zorak fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

MistyEscape.name: Misty Escape
MistyEscape.description: When he drops to 0 hit points outside his resting place, Zorak transforms into a cloud of mist (as in the Shapechanger trait) instead of falling unconscious, provided that he isn't in sunlight or running water. If he can't transform, he is destroyed.

Regeneration.name: Regeneration
Regeneration.description: Zorak regains 20 hit points at the start of his turn if he has at least 1 hit point and isn't in sunlight or running water. If Zorak takes radiant damage or damage from holy water, this trait doesn't function at the start of Zorak's next turn.

SpiderClimb.name: Spider Climb
SpiderClimb.description: Zorak can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Zorak makes two attacks with his dwarven thrower, only one of which can be a ranged attack.

DwarvenThrower.name: DwarvenThrower
DwarvenThrower.description: mw,rw 12 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 11 (1d8 + 7) bludgeoning damage, or 12 (1d10 + 7) bludgeoning damage when used with two hands to make a melee attack. On a ranged attack that hits, the hammer deals an extra 1d8 bludgeoning damage (2d8 if the target is a giant). {@hom}If thrown, the weapon flies back to Zorak's hand after the attack.

Multiattack(VampireFormOnly).name: Multiattack(VampireFormOnly)
Multiattack(VampireFormOnly).description: Zorak makes two attacks, only one of which can be a bite attack.

UnarmedStrike(VampireFormOnly).name: UnarmedStrike(VampireFormOnly)
UnarmedStrike(VampireFormOnly).description: mw 9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. on hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage. Instead of dealing damage, Zorak can grapple the target (escape DC 18).

Bite(BatorVampireFormOnly).name: Bite(BatorVampireFormOnly)
Bite(BatorVampireFormOnly).description: mw 9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one willing creature, or a creature that is grappled by Zorak, incapacitated, or restrained. on hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) necrotic damage. The target's hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the necrotic damage taken, and Zorak regains hit points equal to that amount. The reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces his hit point maximum to 0. A humanoid slain in this way and then buried in the ground rises the following night as a vampire spawn under Zorak's control.

Charm.name: Charm
Charm.description: Zorak targets one humanoid he can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see Zorak, the target must succeed on a DC 17 Wisdom saving throw against this magic or be charmed by Zorak. The charmed target regards Zorak as a trusted friend to be heeded and protected. Although the target isn't under Zorak's control, it takes Zorak's requests or actions in the most favorable way it can, and it is a willing target for Zorak's bite attack.

ChildrenoftheNight(1/Day).name: ChildrenoftheNight(1/Day)
ChildrenoftheNight(1/Day).description: Zorak magically calls 2d4 swarms of swarm of bats||bats or swarm of rats||rats, provided that the sun isn't up. While outdoors, Zorak can call 3d6 wolf||wolves instead. The called creatures arrive in 1d4 rounds, acting as allies of Zorak and obeying his spoken commands. The beasts remain for 1 hour, until Zorak dies, or until Zorak dismisses them as a bonus action.

Agile.name: Agile
Agile.description: The rat doesn't provoke Opportunity Attacks when it moves out of an enemy's reach.

DeathBurst.name: Death Burst
DeathBurst.description: The rat explodes when it dies. con DC 9, each creature in a 5-foot Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation originating from the rat. {@actSaveFail} 1 Acid damage.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: m 2, reach 5 ft. on hit: 1 Piercing damage.

RitualSickle.name: RitualSickle
RitualSickle.description: m 4, reach 5 ft.  on hit: 1d4 + 2 Slashing damage plus 1 Necrotic damage.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Dardew makes two attacks, using Fiery Claw or Power Chord in any combination.

FieryClaw.name: FieryClaw
FieryClaw.description: m 7, reach 5 ft.  on hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) Slashing damage plus 7 (2d6) Fire damage.

PowerChord.name: PowerChord
PowerChord.description: con DC 14, one creature Dardew can see within 120 ft. {@actSaveFail} 13 (3d6 + 3) Thunder damage.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: m 5 (with Advantage|XPHB if the target is Grappled|XPHB by a Demobat), reach 5 ft.  on hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) Piercing damage.

Tentacles.name: Tentacles
Tentacles.description: m 5, reach 5 ft. on hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) Slashing damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, the target has the Grappled|XPHB condition (escape DC 13) from all four tentacles.

PackTactics.name: Pack Tactics
PackTactics.description: The demodog has Advantage|XPHB on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the demodog's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally doesn't have the Incapacitated|XPHB condition.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: m 5, reach 5 ft. on hit: 8 (1d10 + 3) Piercing damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it has the Prone|XPHB condition.

BalefulPresence.name: Baleful Presence
BalefulPresence.description: Sources of light in a 120-foot Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation originating from the demodragon flicker wildly. Nonmagical sources of Bright Light|XPHB in that area instead shed Dim Light|XPHB.

Regeneration.name: Regeneration
Regeneration.description: The demodragon regains 10 Hit Points|XPHB at the start of each of its turns if it has at least 1 Hit Points|XPHB|Hit Point

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The demodragon makes two Bite attacks.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: m 7, reach 10 ft.  on hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) Piercing damage plus 4 (1d8) Acid damage.

AcidBreath{@recharge5}.name: AcidBreath{@recharge5}
AcidBreath{@recharge5}.description: dex DC 13, each creature in a 30-foot-long, 5-foot-wide Line [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Line. {@actSaveFail} 22 (4d10) Acid damage. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage.

BalefulPresence.name: Baleful Presence
BalefulPresence.description: Sources of light in a 60-foot Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation originating from the spawn flicker wildly. Nonmagical sources of Bright Light|XPHB in that area instead shed Dim Light|XPHB.

Regeneration.name: Regeneration
Regeneration.description: The spawn regains 5 Hit Points|XPHB at the start of each of its turns if it has at least 1 Hit Points|XPHB|Hit Point.

RunningLeap.name: Running Leap
RunningLeap.description: With a 10-foot running start, the spawn can Long Jump|XPHB up to 30 feet.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The spawn makes two Claw attacks.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: m 5, reach 10 ft. on hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) Slashing damage.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: m 5, reach 5 ft. on hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) Piercing damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it has the Grappled|XPHB condition (escape DC 13). While Grappled|XPHB, the target has the Blinded|XPHB condition.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: Flizzlebin has Advantage|XPHB on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Ventriloquist.name: Ventriloquist
Ventriloquist.description: Flizzlebin can project his voice from anywhere within 1 mile of himself.

DazzlingConfetti.name: DazzlingConfetti
DazzlingConfetti.description: m,r 5, reach 5 ft. or range 60 ft. on hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) Radiant damage.

VanishingTrick(3/Day).name: VanishingTrick(3/Day)
VanishingTrick(3/Day).description: Flizzlebin has the Invisible|XPHB condition for 10 minutes. This effect ends early immediately after Flizzlebin makes an attack roll, deals damage, or has the Incapacitated|XPHB condition, or if his hat is removed.

DeathBurst.name: Death Burst
DeathBurst.description: The rat explodes when it dies. Constitution Saving Throw|XPHB DC 11, each creature in a 5-foot Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation originating from the rat. {@actSaveFail} 5 (2d4) Acid damage. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: m 5, Reach 5 ft. on hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) Piercing damage plus 5 (2d4) Acid damage.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The imp has Advantage|XPHB on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Sting.name: Sting
Sting.description: m 5, reach 5 ft. on hit: 1d6 + 3 Piercing damage plus 2d6 Poison damage.

Invisibility.name: Invisibility
Invisibility.description: The imp has the Invisible|XPHB condition for 1 minute. This effect ends early immediately after the imp makes an attack roll or deals damage, or if the imp has the Incapacitated|XPHB condition.

Shape-Shift.name: Shape-Shift
Shape-Shift.description: The imp shape-shifts to resemble a rat (Speed|XPHB 20 ft.), a raven (20 ft., Fly 60 ft.), or a spider (20 ft., Climb 20 ft.), or it returns to its true form. Its game statistics are the same in each form, except for its Speed|XPHB. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed.

SewerSpeech.name: Sewer Speech
SewerSpeech.description: Korex can comprehend and verbally communicate with Monstrosities.

RancidKnife.name: RancidKnife
RancidKnife.description: m 5, reach 5 ft. on hit: 8 (2d4 + 3) Piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) Poison damage, and the target has the Poisoned|XPHB condition until the start of Korex's next turn.

EntrancingPipes.name: EntrancingPipes
EntrancingPipes.description: wis DC 12, one creature Korex can see within 120 feet. {@actSaveFail} 14 (4d6) Psychic damage, and the target has the Charmed|XPHB condition until the start of Korex's next turn. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage only.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Rilly June makes two Hayfork attacks.

Hayfork.name: Hayfork
Hayfork.description: m 4, reach 5 ft. on hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) Piercing damage.

G'wan,Git!(1/Day).name: G'wan,Git!(1/Day)
G'wan,Git!(1/Day).description: wis DC 11, one creature Rilly June can see within 60 feet. {@actSaveFail} 10 (3d6) Psychic damage, and the target has the Frightened|XPHB condition until the end of its next turn. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage only.

DeathBurst.name: Death Burst
DeathBurst.description: The rat explodes when it dies. con DC 10, each creature in a 10-foot Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation originating from the rat. {@actSaveFail} 2d4 Acid Damage|XPHB. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage.

Swarm.name: Swarm
Swarm.description: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny rat. The swarm can't regain Hit Points|XPHB.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: m 4, Reach 5 ft. on hit: 6 (2d4 + 2) Piercing damage or 1d4 + 2 Piercing damage if the swarm is Bloodied.

ConstrictingVine.name: ConstrictingVine
ConstrictingVine.description: m 4, reach 10 ft. on hit: 1d10 + 2 Bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the Grappled|XPHB condition (escape DC 12) from one of three vines.

EntanglingVines{@recharge5}.name: EntanglingVines{@recharge5}
EntanglingVines{@recharge5}.description: Grasping vines momentarily appear on each enemy in a 10-foot-radius Sphere [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Sphere centered on a point of the blight's choice within 60 feet of it. Each target must succeed on a DC 12 Strength saving throw or have the Restrained|XPHB condition until the start of the blight's next turn.
